name: Chambre Noire
description:
Chambre Noire is an action / puzzle game. Advance into this dark, unwelcoming manor and make it through perilous rooms. Careful though, you can only see your surroundings for a few seconds at a time, thanks to the flash of your trusty old camera !

Controls :

  • move using the arrow keys
  • A : a or q        (advance text, skip)
  • B : z or w       (flash)
  • START : enter
  • SELECT : space bar

At the beginning of each level, the number under the lightbulb indicates how many flash you get in this room, and the number under the heart how many lives you have left (the game saves automatically at the beginning of a chapter and halfway through).

I Used GB-Studio to make this game, so you can play it in your browser, on your smartphone or even download the rom file and play it on a Game Boy emulator or on your original Game Boy ! (provided you get the right equipment). 

(This game was made mainly during the 2020 lockdown. It can get a bit wonky at times but it should be just fine  ;) ).
